bibl.title: Shenoute of Atripe and the Christian Destruction of Temples in Egypt: Rhetoric and Reality.
From Temple to Church. Destruction and Renewal of Local Cultic Topography in Late Antiquity
bibl.author: EMMEL, Stephen

bibl.note: Pp. 182-197: Appendix. Let Our Eyes, a "Discourse" of Shenoute. Preliminary Edition of the Coptic Text.
bibl.seg: EMMEL Stephen, Shenoute of Atripe and the Christian Destruction of Temples in Egypt: Rhetoric and Reality.

Johannes HAHN, Stephen EMMEL and Ulrich GOTTER (Edd.), From Temple to Church. Destruction and Renewal of Local Cultic Topography in Late Antiquity = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 163 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 161-201, 2 pll.
